amendment.description: An amendment numbered 173 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to increase funding for the Inspector General by $20 million for an Office of the Special Inspector General for Ukraine Assistance, if authorized, and to enhance oversight and accountability measures for funds appropriated for Ukraine, and to reduce Inspector General funding by $20 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
